name.help: the name of the target app

target_folder.title: App root is a sub-folder of:
target_folder.help: Will generate app root folder under this folder

generate_with_config.help: path to app-config file, will use default location when left empty

template.help: pick preconfigured config files based on app type

force_overwrite.help: force backup and overwrite the existing app project

auto_save_preset.title: Auto-save parameters as preset:
auto_save_preset.help: if enabled, will save arguments to session folder when program terminates on success or failure

enable_debug_log.help: if enabled, will collect more runtime diagnostics
